# Syntax and Type Safety Checklist: Add Data Structures

**Purpose**: Validate syntax clarity, operations unambiguity, and type safety requirements quality for the data structures feature
**Created**: 2025-10-17
**Feature**: [Link to spec.md](spec.md)

**Note**: This checklist is generated by the `/speckit.checklist` command based on feature context and requirements.

## Syntax Clarity

- [x] CHK001 Is array literal syntax clearly defined without ambiguity? [Clarity, Spec §FR-001]
- [x] CHK002 Is array access syntax explicitly specified? [Clarity, Spec §FR-002]
- [x] CHK003 Is struct definition syntax unambiguous? [Clarity, Spec §FR-004]
- [x] CHK004 Is struct literal syntax clearly defined? [Clarity, Spec §FR-005]
- [x] CHK005 Is struct access syntax explicitly stated? [Clarity, Spec §FR-006]
- [x] CHK006 Are assignment operations clearly specified for both arrays and structs? [Clarity, Spec §FR-003, FR-007]

## Operations Clarity

- [x] CHK007 Are array modification rules clearly defined? [Clarity, Spec §FR-003]
- [x] CHK008 Are struct field modification rules unambiguous? [Clarity, Spec §FR-007]
- [x] CHK009 Is iteration over arrays clearly specified? [Clarity, User Stories]
- [x] CHK010 Are copying operations for structs clearly defined? [Clarity, User Stories]
- [x] CHK011 Are nested structure operations unambiguous? [Clarity, User Stories]

## Type Safety Requirements

- [x] CHK012 Are type safety rules for array elements clearly specified? [Clarity, Spec §FR-008]
- [x] CHK013 Are type safety rules for struct fields explicitly defined? [Clarity, Spec §FR-008]
- [x] CHK014 Are type checking requirements for array/struct operations documented? [Completeness, Spec §FR-008]
- [x] CHK015 Are compile-time type validation requirements specified? [Completeness, Spec §FR-008]
- [x] CHK016 Are type mismatch error requirements clearly defined? [Clarity, Spec §FR-009]

## Type Safety Coverage

- [x] CHK017 Are type safety requirements covered for all array operations? [Coverage, Spec §FR-002, FR-003]
- [x] CHK018 Are type safety requirements covered for all struct operations? [Coverage, Spec §FR-005, FR-006, FR-007]
- [x] CHK019 Are type safety requirements addressed for nested structures? [Coverage, Spec §FR-008]
- [x] CHK020 Are type safety requirements covered for function parameters? [Coverage, Spec §FR-011]

## Type Safety Consistency

- [x] CHK021 Are type safety rules consistent between arrays and structs? [Consistency, Spec §FR-008]
- [x] CHK022 Do type safety requirements align with existing language type system? [Consistency, Key Entities]
- [x] CHK023 Are type safety error messages consistently specified? [Consistency, Spec §FR-009]

## Ambiguities & Conflicts

- [x] CHK024 Are there ambiguous syntax elements that need clarification? [Ambiguity, Gap]
- [x] CHK025 Do syntax or type safety requirements conflict with existing language? [Conflict, Gap]
- [x] CHK026 Are type safety assumptions validated? [Assumption, Key Entities]

## Notes

- Check items off as completed: `[x]`
- Add comments or findings inline
- Link to relevant resources or documentation
- Items are numbered sequentially for easy reference
